reviews.text: Hazy straw color with fluffy white head. Aroma has some dirty yeast esters. Taste is quite weird, dank with some harsh cardboard. Also some alcohol warmth and cloying yeast.
Pours clear golden with a small white head. Light to moderate fruity, hoppy, aroma. Flavor is citrus hoppy, moderate bittererness. Ends in dry citrus bitter note.

Dark amber color with beige head. Aroma has really nice dark fruits and brown sugar, mostly sweet and malty. Taste is not so intense, slightly malty, toasted, just a slight hint of caramel and dark fruits. Body and carbonation are on the light side. Really nice aroma but the taste is not so impressive.
